ctu_text: ", "detailedDescription_md": "The objective is to develop these two clusters with world-class infrastructure. The guiding principle behind the design of clusters would be to create world-class infrastructure that caters to the business needs of the local artisans & SMEs to boost production and export. In brief, the main objective of setting up these clusters is to assist the artisans & entrepreneurs in setting up world-class units with modern infrastructure, the latest technology, and adequate training and HRD inputs, coupled with market linkages and production diversification. SPV is designed in such a way, it will have Standard Models of units of SSI and SME with infrastructure that is customized to give a competitive edge and these centers have greater potential to become globally competitive.
